content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #307

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 101

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Calling a CDS Service, table
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

user:
The FHIR resource type + id representing the current user.
The type is one of: Practitioner, Patient, or RelatedPerson.
For example, Practitioner/123

Comment:
Suggest expanding list of allowed user types to include Organization and Device, and potentially others. For example, CDS Hooks could be useful for a device or a health system proactively checking to see if a patient is at risk of sepsis, without a user invoking the check. Related to this, suggest renaming from user to something that does not necessarily have to be a person, such as actor or agent or invokingParty

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #307

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 101

Submitted by @kensaku-kawamoto on behalf of @euvitudo from University of Utah

Chapter: Calling a CDS Service, table
Section: https://cds-hooks.org/specification/1.0/
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Existing Wording:

user:
The FHIR resource type + id representing the current user.
The type is one of: Practitioner, Patient, or RelatedPerson.
For example, Practitioner/123

Comment:
Suggest expanding list of allowed user types to include Organization and Device, and potentially others. For example, CDS Hooks could be useful for a device or a health system proactively checking to see if a patient is at risk of sepsis, without a user invoking the check. Related to this, suggest renaming from user to something that does not necessarily have to be a person, such as actor or agent or invokingParty

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #307

Proposed Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Proposed Disposition Comment:
We agree and is a reason why we have already decided (per WGM vote) to move the user field outside of the CDS Service Request to the hook context (if a hook chooses to have a user field). This change to move user addresses the comment.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #307

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Persuasive with Mod
Disposition Comment:
We agree and is a reason why we have already decided (per WGM vote) to move the user field outside of the CDS Service Request to the hook context (if a hook chooses to have a user field). This change to move user addresses the comment.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

isaacvetter commented on Issue #307

I can't find an existing issue or PR that actually moves the user field into context, but I'm pretty certain that it exists ...

kpshek commented on Issue #307

I can't find an existing issue or PR that actually moves the user field into context, but I'm pretty certain that it exists ...

That would be #232

isaacvetter commented on Issue #307

Duplicate of #232, which Bryn's about to resolve.

Going ahead and closing this issue.
